entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 43 %

Wind: NNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
